member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamCreate(System.String)
member.summary: An extension method to create files using FileStream StreamWriter.

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamWrite(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: An extension method to write content to files using FileStream StreamWriter.

example.code: string path = @"C:/TestFile.txt"; path.StreamWrite("This is written using C#!");

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamAppend(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: An extension method to append content to files using FileStream StreamWriter.

example.code: string path = @"C:/TestFile.txt"; path.StreamAppendWrite("This is written using C#!");

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamWriteLines(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: An extension method to write lines to file using FileStream StreamWriter.
member.param: Array of content to write to file

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamAppendLines(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: An extension method to append lines to files using FileStream Stream
member.param: Array of content to write to file

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamRead(System.String)
member.summary: An extension method to read file content using FileStream StreamReader.
member.returns: File Content value of type: string.

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamReadLines(System.String)
member.summary: An extension method to read files and split content by lines.
member.returns: File Content value of type: string[].

member.name: M:Russkyc.AttachedUtilities.FileStreamExtensions.FileStreamExtensions.StreamReadSplit(System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: An extension method to read files and split content to string array.
member.param: A character, or collection of characters that splits the string
member.returns: File Content value of type: string[].
